00014 <script type='text/javascript'>
00015 var timer = new W.Timer();
00016 timer.start();
00017 
00018 var map = new W.WGMap();
00019 map.wps = '80%,80%,xcenter:0,ycenter:0';
00020 
00021 function finish(){
00022     timer.pause();
00023     W.test('If you can see a Google map in the middle of your browser, press OK.', 'W.controls.wGMap, the constructor');
00024     W.test('Try to resize the browser, does the map reposition/resize itself automatically?', 'wednusify user control');
00025     timer.resume();
00026     timer.finish();
00027 }
